Text:
Thanks for the up, 
but this isn't the way Master Bruce Lee teaches it.

Very true, this is not how Bruce Lee would teach it. Sifu Ted Wong is the only student of Bruce Lee that teaches it the correct way. There is a lot of info in this video that is useful, after all Jerry did learn directly from Bruce.
I meant that much of the teaching is incorrect and loses much in his translation. Yes, useful. But key elements are missing.
